_sText:
This is my best map ever i guess, i had a hard time coming up with ideas and awp gave me some, the gameplay is very unique each player start in a diffrent spot there's no same spot where you spawn everytime, and it does not have any kind of camping to it!, this is a very unique map and i hope you like it, it does not play good when you are 1 player the triggers are very weird then, but when you are over 1 player everything plays nice, there is no bugs and no secrets ;)
i have a 24/7 server playing this to!

CSS:
83.227.128.148:27018

Hope you like it!
